main event: On 7 July 1949, at approximately 2100 hours, a round light in the sky was observed by several witnesses in Alexandria, Louisiana. The object was described as orange in color, without any visible means of support, and was said to have hovered and changed directions before gradually moving out of sight.
interesting points: The object was initially spotted while the witnesses were sitting on a porch,The color of the object was described as orange and it resembled a household light bulb,The sighting lasted approximately five minutes, with the object moving from north to west and then back,The object was confirmed to have no visible propulsion or supports,Five different witnesses reported the sighting to authorities.
sighted object: a round orange light in the sky
witness description: The witnesses included local residents, with at least one described as a housewife and practical nurse.
